column5: Every day I've managed to book of this season so far it has rained haha, such bad luck. Anyone going out tomorrow? I keep checking the weather and each time it changes all over the place. Hate the weather man, is it worth getting out for the second time but getting soaked while at it.. Ahh. Already missed the quite bass tourney because of work, sucks!

Planned a half day trip up to Lower Buckhorn for tomorrow. Never been before. I've got three apps running all day tracking this storm. Might pull it off. Looks like the rain is concentrated in bands that have 2 and a half hour windows. Risky but big payoff coldfront possibilities.  Fingers crossed
I got a couple coming up here for a 5 hour tour. Rain is ok,light,n not. Make the call later tonight. Fingers crossed we get out. Too many firsts to misout on.
I picked today because Sunday didn't look good for Simcoe.
Its always worth going fishing!  Where ya headed? My son and I might hit rice in the morning for a bit. My best days on rice so far have been windy, wet days.  Ya won't catch them from the couch!  S.
I know, my parents think im crazy wanting to get out to catch a fish in the rain. If only i lived closer, would hate to drive up there and have downpour like conditions.
